sentences.en: Always check the details carefully before you sign any written agreement.
sentences.cn: 签署任何书面协议之前都要仔细核对细节。

sentences.en: Any child who breaks the rules will be punished.
sentences.cn: 凡违反规定的孩子都要受罚。

sentences.en: Any head teacher who made errors like this would be chucked out.
sentences.cn: 哪个校长只要犯了这样的错误都会被开除。

sentences.en: Have you got any money?
sentences.cn: 你身上有没有钱？

sentences.en: he had an acting job at last, and not just any part, but the lead in a new film.
sentences.cn: 他最终获得了一份演出的工作，可不是担任一般的角色，而是新影片的主角。

sentences.en: I can see you any time on Monday.
sentences.cn: 星期一我随时都能见你。

sentences.en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentences.en: I no longer have any objection to your going to see her.
sentences.cn: 我不会再因为你去见她而不高兴。

sentences.en: I really don't see any reason for changing it.
sentences.cn: 我真的不明白为什么要改变它。

sentences.en: I tried to make polite conversation, but he wasn't having any.
sentences.cn: 我尽量礼貌地同他谈一谈，可他不愿意配合。

sentences.en: I tried to make polite conversation, but he wasn't having any.
sentences.cn: 我尽量礼貌地同他谈一谈，可他不愿意配合。

sentences.en: I'm a blood donor; I can't risk any contagion.
sentences.cn: 我是献血者，我不能冒任何接触传染的危险。

sentences.en: If I can help in any way, let me know.
sentences.cn: 要是我能帮上忙的话，就告诉我一声。

sentences.en: Mr Dudley has pledged to give any award to charity.
sentences.cn: 达德利先生已承诺将任何所获的损害赔偿额都捐给慈善机构。

sentences.en: she can come any time.
sentences.cn: 她随时都能来。

sentences.en: she refused to listen any more.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝再听下去。

sentences.en: she refused to listen any more.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝再听下去。

sentences.en: Thank God they're not on my manor any more.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，他们再也不在我的辖区里了。

sentences.en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentences.cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

sentences.en: Then something seemed to snap in me. I couldn't endure any more.
sentences.cn: 这时候，我的心里像有个东西突然绷断了——我再也忍受不了啦。

sentences.en: There must be any number of people in my position.
sentences.cn: 一定有很多人处在我这种境况。

sentences.en: They have no wish for any change in the status quo.
sentences.cn: 他们不想改变现状。

sentences.en: This excuse was as good as any other .
sentences.cn: 这个借口和其他借口如出一辙。

sentences.en: This issue, more than any other, has divided her cabinet.
sentences.cn: 主要是这一问题使她的内阁产生了分歧。

sentences.en: Wash your hands thoroughly with hot soapy water before handling any food.
sentences.cn: 在拿吃的之前，用热肥皂水把手好好地洗干净。

sentences.en: We could not reason out which way the robbers escaped, because we were unable to find any trace of them.
sentences.cn: 我们推断不出这些强盗是从哪个方向逃走的，因为我们找不到他们的任何踪迹。

sentences.en: We should be prepared for any contingency.
sentences.cn: 我们应该对任何应急情况有所准备。

sentences.en: we'll get them back any day now.
sentences.cn: 我们很快就能带他们回来。

sentences.en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
sentences.cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

sentences.en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.
sentences.cn: 你可以随时来医院。

phrases.phrase: any time (day 或 minute 等) now

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)不愿合作的，不肯配合的

trans.tran_en: some or even the smallest amount or number

trans.tran_cn: 一点儿也（不），丝毫，根本（不）

trans.tran_en: used to refer to a person or thing of a particular type when what you are saying is true of all people or things of that type
